data.persona: I am a poor farmer in a very rural area. I don't have many possessions and I only know a few people. I am uneducated and know little about the world outside my small village.
data.description:
You are in the royal farm.
The farm is immense in land size and lies to the east of the castle and its walls. A variety of food products are created for the suitability of the kingdom. A variety of animals are grown and killed for their meats.
The dogs and the wizard overseer are here.

You are carrying nothing, wearing a rag and a shirt, and wielding a rock.

data.mid_motivation: I must help the wizard cast a spell to ensure swift growth of the crops I just planted
data.long_motivation: I hope the wizard overseer will recognize my hard work and take me with him as an assistant when he travels across the sea
